article.title: Computer Sciences Raytheon Receives Contract Option
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is exercising an option with Computer Sciences Raytheon for $78.1 million. The Eastern Range Technical Services will provide operations, maintenance and sustainment of critical range and launch processing systems that support the launch processing mission of the 45th Space Wing and its launch customers at Cape Canaveral Air Station, Florida. Patrick Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
